name: Bladefish
description:
Blue battles against countless hoards of deadly sea beasts.

A Score-based Arcade game with an action-heavy core. Play as Blue, a swift blue marlin as he faces some of the Caribbean's most powerful sea creatures.

Tap anywhere to dash, cutting through enemies along the way. Build up a combo streak by defeating enemies without taking damage. Aim for the top score on the leaderboards.

Credits:

  • Concept, art and design by Don-Niel Saunders.
  • Developed by Jonathan Miller (ZIG Trinity Inc.).
  • Published by ZIG Trinity Inc..
  • Music by Purple Planet.
